name: css-filter-invert
description: Css module of single purpose classes for filter invert

scripts.start: tachyons src/css-filter-invert.css > css/css-filter-invert.css && tachyons src/css-filter-invert.css --minify > css/css-filter-invert.min.css && tachyons src/css-filter-invert.css --generate-docs --package=../../package.json > readme.md
